about.title: About
about.description: Neo Republic is a democratic simulation platform that enables citizens to propose and evaluate political programs anonymously.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy describes how Neo Republic ('we', 'our', or 'us') collects and processes your information through our platform. We use Google Firebase for our infrastructure, and by using our service, you also agree to Google's Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect and process information through Firebase services:

items.authentication: Authentication data through Firebase Authentication (Google Sign-In)
items.usage: Usage data and interactions stored in Firebase Firestore
items.technical: Technical information processed by Firebase Analytics and Performance Monitoring
items.hosting: Access logs and related data through Firebase Hosting

dataUse.title: Use of Data
dataUse.description: Your data is processed and stored using Firebase services for the following purposes:

items.service: To authenticate and maintain your account through Firebase Authentication
items.storage: To store and retrieve your program proposals and votes in Firebase Firestore
items.analytics: To analyze platform usage through Firebase Analytics
items.security: To ensure platform security using Firebase Security Rules

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement Firebase Security Rules and follow Google Cloud's security best practices to protect your data. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest according to Firebase's security standards.

dataLocation.title: Data Location
dataLocation.description: Your data is stored in Google Cloud Platform's data centers, primarily in the European Union, in compliance with GDPR requirements.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.description: Under GDPR and other applicable laws, you have certain rights regarding your data:

items.access: Right to access your personal data stored in Firebase
items.rectification: Right to correct inaccurate data in our databases
items.deletion: Right to request deletion of your data from Firebase services
items.portability: Right to data portability in a machine-readable format

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: We use the following Firebase services:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For privacy-related inquiries or to exercise your data rights, please contact us. For more information about how Google processes your data, please refer to Google's Privacy Policy.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: By using Neo Republic, you agree to these terms and the underlying Google Firebase terms of service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing or using Neo Republic, you agree to be bound by these terms of service and Firebase's terms of service.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.description: Users must follow these guidelines when using the platform:

items.respect: Respect other users and their opinions
items.content: Post only appropriate and relevant content
items.security: Do not attempt to breach Firebase security measures
items.accuracy: Provide accurate information in program proposals
items.abuse: Do not abuse Firebase services or exceed usage quotas

items.ownership: You retain ownership of your content stored in Firebase
items.license: You grant us license to store and process your content using Firebase services
items.removal: We reserve the right to remove content that violates Firebase policies

service.title: Service Provision
service.description: Our service is provided through Firebase platform:

items.availability: Service availability depends on Firebase infrastructure
items.maintenance: Periodic maintenance follows Firebase maintenance windows
items.limits: Service limits are subject to Firebase quotas and restrictions

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: Neo Republic and Firebase are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.description: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms or Firebase terms of service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may update these terms to reflect changes in Firebase services or our platform.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This policy explains how we use cookies and Firebase-related technologies.

firebaseCookies.title: Firebase Cookies and Local Storage
firebaseCookies.description: We use Firebase services that store data locally:

auth.title: Authentication Tokens
auth.description: Firebase Authentication stores tokens for user session management

analytics.title: Analytics Data
analytics.description: Firebase Analytics uses cookies to analyze usage patterns

performance.title: Performance Data
performance.description: Firebase Performance Monitoring collects performance metrics

items.browser: Adjust browser settings to manage Firebase cookies

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: This policy may be updated to reflect changes in Firebase services or regulations.

hero.title: Reimagining Democracy Through Policy-First Voting
hero.subtitle: Vote for ideas, not personalities. A new approach to democratic participation.

citizen.title: As a Citizen
citizen.vote: Vote on election day or express your voting intentions for programs that interest you
citizen.propose: Propose your own programs with detailed policy objectives

expert.title: As an Expert
expert.description: Review programs and validate financial data of proposed objectives

about.title: About This Project
about.description: This democratic simulation aims to shift focus from personality-driven politics to policy-based decision making. By enabling anonymous program submissions and expert validation, we create a space where ideas can be evaluated on their merits alone.

goals.title: Our Goals
goals.quality: Improve the quality of political discourse
